a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in mean female height in adults by year of birth, from 1896 to 1996. This therefore measures the change
in mean height for women who reach age 18 in 1914 versus 2014.
Data source: NCD RisC, Human Height (2017)
